title: Monsters Vs Aliens [NDS.movieS] .dpg.SCOPE
description:
nDs-mPeG, usually abbreviated DPG, is a special format of MPEG-1 video specifically for playback using the homebrew Moonshell program for the Nintendo DS. The video is encoded on a computer and then transferred, along with Moonshell, to the DS for playback.



 

Directors:Rob Letterman & Conrad Vernon

Writers:Maya Forbes & Wallace Wolodarsky 

Release Date:3 April 2009 (UK) 

Genre:Animation | Action | Sci-Fi 

Tagline:Oooze gonna save us? 

Plot:When a meteorite from outer space hits a young girl and turns her into a giant monster, she is taken to a secret government compound where she meets a ragtag group of monsters also rounded up over the years. 



Ripped from ***Monsters Vs. Aliens TS XviD-W.A.L***
